channel.title: Dependency on Burgers & Bytes

item.title: Import solution missing dependencies error
item.description: Issue Receiving errors while deploying solutions can be a frustrating experience. Errors given The first time exporting and importing my solution gave errors which I didn’t understand. All dependent objects where available in the solution The error message: “The solution.xml for the solution xxx contains an unmanaged dependency on the Active solution with type 1, schemaName her_camp, displayName Camp. A solution will fail to import in a target environment when missing dependencies on unmanaged components are present.
